testcase.classname: Login into the automation practice site and place an order for a book through shop option
testcase.name: Login and place an order through shop option
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the automation practice site url...........................passed Then Click on My Account option.............................................passed Then enter username And password............................................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then verify the logged in username..........................................passed Then click on shop option...................................................passed And add HTML5 Forms to basket...............................................passed Then click on view basket...................................................passed Then click on proceed to checkout...........................................passed Then fill billing details...................................................passed And click on Place Order button.............................................passed Then verify thank you message...............................................passed And print the order number..................................................passed And logout from the application.............................................passed
